_header: O wicked women wilful and variable
_description: Abuse of women — three stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
O wicket wemen wilfull and variablericht fals feckle fell and
                    frivolus…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Vnchest evill chosin and all but cheretieMellit with misdeid
                    and all mensworne ar ȝe
